name: Baldi's Basics Plus 2D Mobile
description:
Controls:

Joystick to move

USE to interact with items and things

Tap the item box to use an item

MAP to open map.

Toggle sprint using RUN.

ACT to jumprope.

STORE to go to Johnny's Store

The items:

Soda: Spit the soda at Baldi.

Tape: Press SPACE in the detention room to distract Baldi.

Scissors: Cut Playtime's jumprope or Beans' gum

Energy Flavored Zesty Bar: Gives full stamina.

WD-Nosquee: Run faster.

Alarm Clock: Baldi will go to the clock when it activates.

Apple: Baldi likes apples.

Dangerous Teleporter: Teleports you somewhere random

Principal's Keys: Lets you leave detention

Portal Poster: Press USE over one of them to teleport.

Dirty Chalk Eraser: The principal can't see you

Quarter: Use in a vending machine

Faculty Nametag: Everything thinks you are a faculty member

This version of Baldi's Basics Plus 2D does not get large updates with the exception of performance and control updates.

Baldi's Basics Plus and Baldi's Basics Classic by Basically Games, graphics by me and Basically Games, sounds and music by Basically Games, code by me. All other audio and music from their original owners.
